TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DisplayMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: 定義識別項，這個識別項會指示 所使用的顯示模式。

span.span: Defines identifiers that indicate the display modes used by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 識別碼用來表示用來顯示每個位元組序列的顯示模式。The identifiers are used to indicate the display mode used to display each byte sequence. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用識別項。The following code example demonstrates how to use identifiers. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[ByteViewerExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ByteViewerExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ByteViewerExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ByteViewerExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ByteViewerExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ByteViewerExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ComponentModel.Design.DisplayMode Ansi = int32(2)

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用識別項。The following code example demonstrates how to use identifiers. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[ByteViewerExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ByteViewerExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ByteViewerExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ByteViewerExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ByteViewerExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ByteViewerExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ComponentModel.Design.DisplayMode Auto = int32(4)

summary.span: 自動選取顯示模式的顯示模式。

span.span: A display mode that automatically selects a display mode.

summary.span: 在這個模式下，會檢查位元組，以判斷位元組是否為十六進位或可列印的。

span.span: In this mode, the bytes are examined to determine if they are hexadecimal or printable.

summary.span: 如果位元組是十六進位格式，則會選取 模式。

span.span: If the bytes are in hexadecimal format, the mode is selected.

summary.span: 如果字元符合可列印的字元集 (Character Set)，則會執行測試，自動選取 或 顯示模式。

span.span: If the characters match a printable character set, a test is run to automatically select either the or display mode.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用識別項。The following code example demonstrates how to use identifiers. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
